# Plot July SST from Levitus atlas

Load the SST data (from ``ocedata`` package, an adjunct to ``oce``).
```{r}
library(oce)
data(levitus, package="ocedata")
str(levitus)
```

R normally uses wide margins, with space for several lines of text.  But we are
drawing a map without axes and so tightnen up the space to 1 line on each of
four sides.
%```{r}
%```

We will use a temperature range from -2C to 30C.
```{r}
Tlim <- c(-2, 30)
```

Now, proceed to the plot.
% tried dev='CairoPNG' but it produces Fontconf errors and looks no better
```{r SST,fig.path="figure/SST_",fig.width=8,fig.height=4,dpi=100,fig.cap="**Sea surface temperature.**"}
par(mar=rep(1, 4))
drawPalette(Tlim, col=oceColorsJet)
# Start main plot with the coastline
data(coastlineWorld)
mapPlot(coastlineWorld, projection="mollweide", grid=FALSE)
# Add the SST
mapImage(levitus$longitude, levitus$latitude, levitus$SST,
         col=oceColorsJet, zlim=Tlim, missingColor='lightgray')
```
